name: MIS Activity Risk Assessments
description:
Details active alerts for the establishment population includes Religion, Ethnicity, IEP and Current Security Category.
ACT0023 v1.0 Activity Risk Assessments Report

dataset.name: Main Data
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.RELIGION_CODE, 'Not Specified') AS RELIGION_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND, CASE WHEN AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL IS NULL THEN 'Unclassified' ELSE AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL END AS CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_ASSESSMENT AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY WHERE (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_FLAG (+) = 'Y') AND (AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, RELIGION_CODE, ETHNIC_CODE, IEP_BAND, CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY, 'TBD' AS V_NONE_OR_ACTIVE_ FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.description: @Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69)

dataset.name: Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Alerts
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END AS ALERT_EFFECTIVE_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_STATUS, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.RELIGION_CODE, 'Not Specified') AS RELIGION_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_DATE_SK = AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, ALERT_CODE_NK, FIRST_NAME, ALERT_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_EFFECTIVE_DATE, ALERT_STATUS, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, RELIGION_CODE, ETHNIC_CODE, 'TBD' AS V_NONE_OR_ACTIVE_ FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.description: @Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_NONE_OR_ACTIVE_ IS NOT NULL)

field.name: $ref:V_NONE_OR_ACTIVE_
field.legacySql: =If(Sum(Count([Alert Code] In ([NOMS Number]) Where ([Alert Status] = "ACTIVE"))) In ([NOMS Number])=0;"N/A";([Alert Code] Where ([Alert Status] = "ACTIVE")))
